item.title: US-16 East Approaching US-16 Truck
item.description: US-16 East Approaching US-16 Truck in Rapid City. Use either US-16 or US-16 Truck for access to I-90.

item.title: US-16 East at US-16A/To SD-244
item.description: US-16 East at US-16A West/To SD-244 West/Keystone/Mount Rushmore.

item.title: US-16 East at US-16A/To SD-244
item.description: US-16 East at US-16A/To SD-244/Keystone/Mount Rushmore. Continue east on US-16 for Rapid City.

item.title: US-16 East Approaching US-16A/To SD-244
item.description: US-16 East Approaching US-16A/To SD-244 to Keystone and Mount Rushmore. Continue east on US-16 for Rapid City.

item.title: US-16 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-16 East. Distance to Keystone, Mount Rushmore, and Rapid City.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East at US-385/US-16 Split
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East at US-385/US-16 split in Pennington County.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East at SD-244
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East at SD-244 East to Mount Rushmore. Continue on US-385 North/US-16 East to Hill City.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385. Use US-16 West/US-385 South to Crazy Horse, Jewel Cave, and Wind Cave.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-385/US-16
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-385/US-16 in Pennington County.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385 in Pennington County. Use US-16 East/US-385 North to Hill City and Mount Rushmore. Use US-16 West/US-385 South to Crazy Horse.

item.title: SD-87 North at SD-89
item.description: SD-87 North at SD-89 in Custer County. Use SD-89 South to Jct. US-16A and Custer. Use SD-87 North for US-16/US-385, Sylvan Lake Lodge, Hill City, and Crazy Horse Mountain.

item.title: Distance Marker on SD-89 North Approaching SD-87
item.description: Distance Marker at end of SD-89 North approaching SD-87. Distance via SD-87 North to Sylvan Lake Lodge, Jct. US-16/US-385, and Hill City.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East/SD-89 North at US-16A
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East/SD-89 North at US-16A in Custer. Turn left for US-385 North/US-16 East; continue straight for US-16A East/SD-89 North.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A
item.description: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A in Custer. Use US-395 North/US-16 East to Hill City and Rapid City. Use US-16A East/SD-89 North to Custer State Park.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North at US-16
item.description: US-385/SD-89 North at US-16 in Custer. US-385 north joins US-16 east through Hill City. SD-89 joins US-16 east through Custer.

item.title: US-16 West/WY-116 South at WY-116 South
item.description: US-16 West/WY-116 South at WY-116 South in Upton, Wyoming. WY-116 joins US-16 briefly through Upton.

item.title: WY-116 South at US-16
item.description: WY-116 South at US-16. Although it is not signed, WY-116 follows US-16 for a few blocks through Upton. WY-116 south traffic, turn left at this intersection.

item.title: WY-116 South Approaching US-16
item.description: WY-116 south approaching US-16 in Upton, Wyoming.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 153
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 153 - To US-14/US-16/Moorcroft/Newcastle. US-14 and US-16 leave I-90 east here. Use this exit for the Moorcroft Rest Area.

item.title: I-90 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-90/US-14/US-16 east in Campbell County, Wyoming. Distance to Moorcroft, Sundance, and Newcastle (via US-16).

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 141
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 141 - Rozet.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 132
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 132 - Wyodak Road. The smokestacks in the background are from the Wyodak Power Plant, part of the Wyodak Coalmine complex.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 129 - Garner Lake Road.

item.title: US-14/US-16 East/WY-59 South at WY-50 (To I-90)
item.description: US-14/US-16 East/WY-59 South at WY-50 (To I-90). Continue ahead on US-14/US-16 east for I-90 to Douglas and Moorcroft. Turn right for I-90 West (WY-50) for Buffalo.

item.title: BL-90/US-14/US-16 East at WY-59
item.description: BL-90/US-14/US-16 east at WY-59. Turn right for I-90 (west)/WY-59 South to Douglas. Continue straight ahead for I-90 east.

item.title: US-14/US-16 West/WY-59 North/To I-90
item.description: US-14/US-16 West, WY-59 North, To I-90 (Business I-90) in Gillette.

item.title: BL-90/US-14/US-16 West at WY-59
item.description: BL-90/US-14/US-16 west at WY-59. Turn left for I-90 (west)/WY-59 South to Douglas. Continue straight ahead for BL-90/US-14/US-16 West and WY-59 North. WY-59 follows US-14/US-16 through Gillette.

item.title: Begin BL-90 at I-90
item.description: Begin BL-90 at I-90 west onramp (Exit 128). Use I-90 west for Buffalo. Continue west for BL-90/US-14/US-16 into Gillette.

item.title: I-90 East at WY-51/US-14/US-16
item.description: I-90 east Exit 128 at BL-90/US-14/US-16/WY-51. Use BL-90/US-14/US-16 west for Gillette and Port of Entry.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 128
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 128 - Port of Entry. This is the east end of the Gillette business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 124 and 126
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 124 - BL-90/US-14/US-16 West/WY-50/Gillette. Approaching Exit 126 - WY-59/Gillette/Douglas.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 58
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 58 - US-16/Buffalo/Ucross. This is the eastern end of the I-90 business loop through Buffalo.

item.title: I-90 East - Use Exit 56B For US-16
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 56B. Use I-25 south for US-16 jct. in Buffalo.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310. Turn right on US-310 West/WY-789 north for Lovell and Billings (Montana). This is the eastern end of US-310. WY-789 leaves US-14/US-16/US-20 here and turns west onto US-310.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 at US-310/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789. Use US-14/US-16/US-20 West for Cody and Yellowstone. Turn right to continue north WY-789. This is the southern terminus of US-310.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-310/WY-789 North. Turn right to continue on WY-789 North. This is where US-310 begins.

item.title: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North
item.description: US-14/US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North leaving Greybull.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-14
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-14 in Greybull. Turn right for US-14 east to Shell and Sheridan. Continue west on US-14/US-16/US-20 for Lovell, Cody, and Yellowstone.

item.title: US-14 Scenic Byway Information on US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North
item.description: Scenic Byway information for US-14 on US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North approaching Greybull. Use US-14 East for the Big Horn Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North - Basin
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 north in Basin.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at WY-30
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at WY-30. Use WY-30 west for Burlington.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North At WY-30
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North At WY-30 in Basin.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North - Manderson
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North in Manderson.

item.title: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at WY-31
item.description: US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North at WY-31 to Manderson and Hyattville.

item.title: US-20 West/WY-789 North - US-16 Jct
item.description: US-20 West/WY-789 North at US-16 junction in Worland. Continue straight for US-16 east to Buffalo. Turn left for US-16/US-20 West/WY-789 North to Basin and Yellowstone (National Park).

item.title: US-20 West/WY-789 North Approaching US-16
item.description: US-20 West/WY-789 North Approaching US-16 in Worland.

item.title: US-20/US-16 West/WY-789 North Approaching WY-433
item.description: US-20/US-16 West/WY-789 North Approaching WY-433. The river in the background is the Big Horn River.

item.title: US-16/US-385 South at SD-87
item.description: SD-87/Needles Highway Junction on US-385/US-16 South
